SALT LAKE CITY
SAN FRANCISCO
8-PASSENGER LAND AND WATER PLANE
CATALINA
Travel by Air
For Business:
Already many business men have adopted this means
of transportation exclusively wherever Western Air Ex-
press planes travel. Besides the time saved they find that
instead of a tiresome trip they are rested and refreshed
and end their journey
ready and fit for their business
duties and with their efficiency increased.
For Pleasure:
Western Air Express lines cover much of the scenic
beauties of the United States from the
"Mile-High"
air-
way of Colorado to the below-sea-level points of Death
Valley and even out to that Magic Isle of the Pacific-
Catalina Island-
-in ships that fly from either land or sea.
Relaxed in comfortable chairs the view unobstructed. un-
limited.
ever-changing, one floats along and watches the
world slip by. It is all so natural, so easy-
-and two miles
a minute is only noticed by your destination arriving all
too soon.
For Comfort:
Everything possible is done for your comfort. Trans-
portation is furnished to and from the airports for all
regular passenger ships.
You move about the cabin at
will except when taking off or landing. The cabins provide
an unusual amount of room and are equipped with every
convenience including a complete dressing room at the
rear.
These cabins may be heated or cooled as desired,
therefore only ordinary clothing should be worn.
You
may be as cool as you wish even crossing the desert in
mid-summer. The very smoothness of travel, the absence
of sharp turns and grinding brakes makes apparent the
slight upward and downward currents of air which are
sometimes encountered but which, while noticeable, are
not at all troublesome to these big ships. The fresh air
tends to create an appetite, so on the longer lines a tasty
lunch is provided. Cool drinking water always handy.
Western Air Express has planes for charter or special service to land airports or water harbors anywhere in the U.S.
FOR RATES AND SCHEDULES INQUIRE AT NEAREST WESTERN AIR EXPRESS OFFICE OR AGENT:
HOME OFFICE: Los Angeles, 113 West 9th Street, Phone TRinity 9191
DIVISION OFFICES:
San Francisco, 661 Market St., Phone Sutter 1482—Oakland Municipal Airport, Phone Elmhurst
1313-Denver, 1658 Champa St., Phone Main 5418-
-Salt Lake City, Airport, Phone Wasatch 7023
—Catalina Island, Phone Avalon 45-W-Chicago, 103 West Monroe St.
ALSO GENERAL TRAVEL BUREAUS AND AGENCIES
2001. 038.120
